attributes.action: remove the application of extra and unfair rules to Doctors with HSMP applyng for NHS jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "remove the application of extra and unfair rules to Doctors with HSMP applyng for NHS jobs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11962.asp

Prime Minister's Office
